title: On The Trail With Cory Booker
description: In an ongoing series the NPR Politics Podcast is hitting the road and interviewing 2020 Democratic presidential candidates. This episode Scott Detrow and New Hampshire Public Radio's Casey McDermott sit down with Democratic Sen. Cory Booker to ask about why he's the best pick for president. This series is produced in collaboration with NHPR and Iowa Public Radio.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: On The Trail With Cory Booker
itunes:author: Scott Detrow
itunes:summary: The senator and Democratic presidential candidate is hoping to "inspire the moral imagination in this country."
itunes:subtitle: The senator and Democratic presidential candidate is hoping to "inspire the moral imagination in this country."
